lst.name: sentence
lst.str: F> should rise to 51 or 52 billion marks in the current year to September 31 after a 19 pct upturn in the first five months, management board chairman Karlheinz Kaske said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Kaske said domestic orders rose to 10.2 billion marks in the first five months of this year, or nine pct above their level in the same 1985/86 period, boosted in particular by orders for the fully owned Kraftwerk Union AG subsidiary.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The rise was mainly due to payment in January for a West German nuclear power station which led to a jump in domestic sales of 36 pct.
